notes:
It looks '''exactly''' the same as a [[Giant Spider]] and may scare uninformed players. It behaves like a mere [[Spider]] though.
{{JSpoiler|Killing this creature for the first time will grant you the [[achievement]] [[Someone's Bored]].}}
sounds: It seems this was just an illusion.
name: Giant Spider (Wyda)
location: [[Greenclaw Swamp]], in the vicinity of [[Wyda]]'s house. It has also been encountered {{Mapper Coords|127.233|125.13|7|2|text=south}} of Wyda's house.
strategy: [[File:2gs_bloodherbquest.jpg|2 [[Giant Spider]]s at the [[Blood Herb Quest]]|thumb|right]] Treat it the same as you would treat a [[Spider]] in combat. It's not a great threat at all.
